name: twoppy
overview:
twoppy is a fully self-service platform that empowers event organizers to create an interactive mobile event guide, worldwide and free.

An easy to use, web based content management system, accessible at all times in order to keep all event communication up to date.

Visitors have instant access to the most relevant information on their mobile device, including real time show information, performer details and interactive map(s). Additionally visitors are able to rate program items, see who’s attending the event as well, send messages to each other within the app and share relevant information through social media. twoppy is suitable for conferences, fairs, festivals and sports events, but also zoos, theme parks and museums.
